title: No escape from the boss with Wi-Fi in the sky
title_page: No escape from the boss with Wi-Fi in the sky | The Straits Times
maintext:
Singapore Airlines is giving free unlimited in-flight Wi-Fi to its KrisFlyer members in all cabin classes from July 1. It looks like a savvy move by the airline and a sweet reward for frequent fliers.
It also got me wondering. Do we rejoice that work and play can continue unabated in the air? Or regret the loss of a sanctuary in the sky?
